preqs: Completed four units (four elective units for JD students) and obtained 70% or above in each of the units.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}

description: This unit involves completion of a 25,000-30,000 words (maximum) thesis. The topic is designed by the student in conjunction with a staff member and approved by the Postgraduate Board of Examiners. Students work under supervision but with considerable independence. The unit is suitable for students seeking a pathway to doctoral studies.
